Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Interface AppointmentDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UCertdbAppointmentDAO
public interface AppointmentDAO
An AppointmentDAO is a Data Access Object with the methods needed to interact with Appointment data

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer​(int customerID)
    Deletes all the Appointments of the Customer with customerID of customerID
    java.lang.Boolean deleteAppointment​(int apptID)
    Deletes an existing Appointment, with the appointmentID apptID, from the data source
    java.util.ArrayList<com.boslott.model.Appointment> findAllAppointments​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
    Gets all Appointments from the data source.
    java.util.ArrayList<com.boslott.model.Appointment> findAllCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerName)
    Gets all Appointments from the data source related to one customer, data source searched based on customer name
    java.lang.Boolean insertAppointment​(com.boslott.model.Appointment newAppt)
    Inserts a new Appointment entry in the data source, populated with data from the newAppt object
    java.lang.Boolean updateAppointment​(com.boslott.model.Appointment apptToUpdate)
    Updates an existing Appointment entry in the data source, updated with data from the apptToUpdate object

  • Method Details

    • findAllAppointments

      java.util.ArrayList<com.boslott.model.Appointment> findAllAppointments​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
      Gets all Appointments from the data source. If this DAO chooses to cache the results, the refetch parameters signals whether to send the cached data or to call to the data source again
      Parameters:
      refetch - if true, this method will call to the data source to get data; if false, this method will return locally cached data or will call to the data source again (if this method chooses to not cache results)
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Appointments from the data source

    • findAllCustomerAppointments

      java.util.ArrayList<com.boslott.model.Appointment> findAllCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerName)
      Gets all Appointments from the data source related to one customer, data source searched based on customer name
      Parameters:
      customerName - the name of the customer to search for related Appointments
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Appointments related to the customer with the name customerName

    • insertAppointment

      java.lang.Boolean insertAppointment​(com.boslott.model.Appointment newAppt)
      Inserts a new Appointment entry in the data source, populated with data from the newAppt object
      Parameters:
      newAppt - the object containing all the new Appointment property values (except the appointmentID)
      Returns:
      true if the insertion successfully completes, false if the insertion does not successfully complete

    • updateAppointment

      java.lang.Boolean updateAppointment​(com.boslott.model.Appointment apptToUpdate)
      Updates an existing Appointment entry in the data source, updated with data from the apptToUpdate object
      Parameters:
      apptToUpdate - the object containing all the data needed to update the property values of the Appointment, including the ID of the Appointment of which to update
      Returns:
      true if the update successfully completes, false if the update does not complete successfully

    • deleteAppointment

      java.lang.Boolean deleteAppointment​(int apptID)
      Deletes an existing Appointment, with the appointmentID apptID, from the data source
      Parameters:
      apptID - the appointmentID of the Appointment to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion successfully completes, false if the deletion does not successfully complete

    • deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer

      java.lang.Boolean deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer​(int customerID)
      Deletes all the Appointments of the Customer with customerID of customerID
      Parameters:
      customerID - the customerID of the Customer to delete all related Appointments
      Returns:
      true if the deletion successfully completes, false if the deletion does not successfully complete
